languages.text: "Нет, он не виноват, никогда не был и не будет. Просто... Да ты видишь, что со мной? Какой арбитр так трясется из-за кибермастифа? Зависимость, слабость... Да я уже отработанный материал".

"No. He's not guilty. He never was and never will be. It's just... You can see I have a problem, can't you? What kind of Arbitrator turns into a quivering mess over a cyber-mastiff? It's a dependency, a weakness... I'm no longer fit for purpose."
languages.original_text: "Нет, он не виноват, никогда не был и не будет. Просто... Да ты видишь, что со мной? Какой арбитр так трясется из-за кибермастифа? Зависимость, слабость... Да я уже отработанный материал".

traits.locale_text: "No. He's not guilty. He never was and never will be. It's just... You can see I have a problem, can't you? What kind of Arbitrator turns into a quivering mess over a cyber-mastiff? It's a dependency, a weakness... I'm no longer fit for purpose."

"No. He's not guilty. He never was and never will be. It's just... You can see I have a problem, can't you? What kind of Arbitrator turns into a quivering mess over a cyber-mastiff? It's a dependency, a weakness... I'm no longer fit for purpose."

"No. He's not guilty. He never was and never will be. It's just... You can see I have a problem, can't you? What kind of Arbitrator turns into a quivering mess over a cyber-mastiff? It's a dependency, a weakness... I'm no longer fit for purpose."

"No. He's not guilty. He never was and never will be. It's just... You can see I have a problem, can't you? What kind of Arbitrator turns into a quivering mess over a cyber-mastiff? It's a dependency, a weakness... I'm no longer fit for purpose."

"No. He's not guilty. He never was and never will be. It's just... You can see I have a problem, can't you? What kind of Arbitrator turns into a quivering mess over a cyber-mastiff? It's a dependency, a weakness... I'm no longer fit for purpose."

languages.text: 「違う。彼に罪はない。今までも、これからも、罪などないんだ。ただ…わかるだろ？俺に問題があるってことが。サイバーマスチフのことで取り乱すアービトレイターなんてどこにいるんだ？これは依存で、弱さだ…俺にはもう、役目を果たす資格がないんだ…」
languages.original_text: "No. He's not guilty. He never was and never will be. It's just... You can see I have a problem, can't you? What kind of Arbitrator turns into a quivering mess over a cyber-mastiff? It's a dependency, a weakness... I'm no longer fit for purpose."

traits.locale_text: 「違う。彼に罪はない。今までも、これからも、罪などないんだ。ただ…わかるだろ？俺に問題があるってことが。サイバーマスチフのことで取り乱すアービトレイターなんてどこにいるんだ？これは依存で、弱さだ…俺にはもう、役目を果たす資格がないんだ…」

languages.text: "Nein. Er ist nicht schuldig. Er war es nie und wird es niemals sein. Aber ... Ihr seht doch, dass ich ein Problem habe, oder? Was ist das für ein Arbitrator, der wegen eines Cyber-Mastiffs zu einem Häufchen Elend wird? Das ist Abhängigkeit, das ist Schwäche ... Ich bin nicht länger geeignet für meine Aufgabe."
languages.original_text: "No. He's not guilty. He never was and never will be. It's just... You can see I have a problem, can't you? What kind of Arbitrator turns into a quivering mess over a cyber-mastiff? It's a dependency, a weakness... I'm no longer fit for purpose."

traits.locale_text: "Nein. Er ist nicht schuldig. Er war es nie und wird es niemals sein. Aber ... Ihr seht doch, dass ich ein Problem habe, oder? Was ist das für ein Arbitrator, der wegen eines Cyber-Mastiffs zu einem Häufchen Elend wird? Das ist Abhängigkeit, das ist Schwäche ... Ich bin nicht länger geeignet für meine Aufgabe."

languages.text: « Non. Il n'est pas coupable. Il ne l'a jamais été et ne le sera jamais. C'est juste que... Vous voyez que j'ai un problème, n'est-ce pas ? Quel arbitrator digne de ce nom s'écroule aussi pitoyablement dès qu'il est séparé de son chien ? C'est une dépendance, un point faible... Je ne suis plus en mesure d'accomplir mon devoir. »
languages.original_text: "No. He's not guilty. He never was and never will be. It's just... You can see I have a problem, can't you? What kind of Arbitrator turns into a quivering mess over a cyber-mastiff? It's a dependency, a weakness... I'm no longer fit for purpose."

traits.locale_text: « Non. Il n'est pas coupable. Il ne l'a jamais été et ne le sera jamais. C'est juste que... Vous voyez que j'ai un problème, n'est-ce pas ? Quel arbitrator digne de ce nom s'écroule aussi pitoyablement dès qu'il est séparé de son chien ? C'est une dépendance, un point faible... Je ne suis plus en mesure d'accomplir mon devoir. »

languages.text: «No. No es culpable; nunca lo fue, y nunca lo será. Es que... ¿No se da cuenta del problema que tengo? ¿Qué clase de Arbitrator se viene abajo por un cibermastín? Esta dependencia me hace débil... Ya no soy apto para el servicio».
languages.original_text: "No. He's not guilty. He never was and never will be. It's just... You can see I have a problem, can't you? What kind of Arbitrator turns into a quivering mess over a cyber-mastiff? It's a dependency, a weakness... I'm no longer fit for purpose."

traits.locale_text: «No. No es culpable; nunca lo fue, y nunca lo será. Es que... ¿No se da cuenta del problema que tengo? ¿Qué clase de Arbitrator se viene abajo por un cibermastín? Esta dependencia me hace débil... Ya no soy apto para el servicio».

languages.text: “没有，它是无辜的。它从来都是无辜的，也永远不会犯罪。只是……你也能看出来是我出了问题，是吧？怎么会有哪个法务官，仅仅因为一只生化獒犬就失去了理智？这是一种依赖，是我的弱点……我已经不再适合当法务官了。”
languages.original_text: "No. He's not guilty. He never was and never will be. It's just... You can see I have a problem, can't you? What kind of Arbitrator turns into a quivering mess over a cyber-mastiff? It's a dependency, a weakness... I'm no longer fit for purpose."

traits.locale_text: “没有，它是无辜的。它从来都是无辜的，也永远不会犯罪。只是……你也能看出来是我出了问题，是吧？怎么会有哪个法务官，仅仅因为一只生化獒犬就失去了理智？这是一种依赖，是我的弱点……我已经不再适合当法务官了。”

languages.text: "Hayır. O suçlu değil. Hiçbir zaman değildi, hiçbir zaman da olmayacak. Sadece... Bende bir sorun olduğunu görebiliyorsun, değil mi? Ne tür bir Yargıcı, siber mastif yüzünden bu hâle düşer? Bu bir bağımlılık... Zayıflık... Artık bu işe uygun değilim."
languages.original_text: "No. He's not guilty. He never was and never will be. It's just... You can see I have a problem, can't you? What kind of Arbitrator turns into a quivering mess over a cyber-mastiff? It's a dependency, a weakness... I'm no longer fit for purpose."

traits.locale_text: "Hayır. O suçlu değil. Hiçbir zaman değildi ve hiçbir zaman da olmayacak. Sadece... Bende bir sorun olduğunu görebiliyorsun, değil mi? Ne tür bir Yargıcı bir siber mastif yüzünden bu hâle düşer? Bu bir bağımlılık... Bir zayıflık... Artık bu işe uygun değilim."
